modName: Better Falskaar and Wyrmstooth Map With Roads
summary: Improve the world map for Falskaar and Wyrmstooth, add main roads to the maps.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Description[/b][/size]
 
Replace the map textures for two great new land mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]Falskaar[/url] by Alexander J. Velicky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25704/?]Wyrmstooth[/url] by jonx0r.
 
Improve the quality and add main roads. Note the quality is still low compared to some vanilla map mods (see the images). I've been playing Skyrim with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4929/?]A Quality World Map - With Roads[/url] from the start, so I add the roads to the maps myself, this should help you navigating the fairly large land in Falskaar and Wyrmstooth.
 

[size=5][b]Install & Uninstall[/b][/size]
 
Install with NMM or MO or manually drop the unpacked file to Data Folder.
For manual uninstall, delete folder /Data/Textures/Terrain/Falskaar and /Data/Textures/Terrain/WyrmstoothWorld.
 

[size=5][b]Compatibility[/b][/size]
 
Should be compatible with everything other than the mods change the Falskaar or Wyrmstooth map textures.
 
Recommend to work with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40468/?]Falskaar World Map Clouds[/url].


[size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size]
 
Credits to Alexander J. Velicky and his work, Falskaar.
Credits to jonx0r and his work, Wyrmstooth.
This mod is not supported by original authors in any way shape or form, and is an independent mod with its own responsibilities and faults.


[size=5][b]Version History[/b][/size]
1.0: 2/20/2014
Release.
1.1: 2/22/2014
Minor change to the roads. Texture size reduced.
1.2: 2/24/2014
Add Wyrmstooth road map.

author: dastrokes
